title: asserts don't trigger in aten build
body_html:
Lower-case asserts don't trigger in the aten build; this wasn't an issue with an (old) standalone ATen build.

ASSERT(...) does still trigger, so independent of whether we want to new behavior, we should probably change the existing tests to uniformly use ASSERT(...); currently some do and some don't.

cc @zdevito.
body_text:

ASSERT(...) does still trigger, so independent of whether we want to new behavior, we should probably change the existing tests to uniformly use ASSERT(...); currently some do and some don't.
cc @zdevito.
body:
Lower-case asserts don't trigger in the aten build; this wasn't an issue with an (old) standalone ATen build.

ASSERT(...) does still trigger, so independent of whether we want to new behavior, we should probably change the existing tests to uniformly use ASSERT(...); currently some do and some don't.

cc @zdevito.
